Uses of Class
fast3d.simple.SimpleUniverse

  • Packages that use SimpleUniverse 
    Package Description
    fast3d.simple  
    fast3d.simple.fragment  

    • Uses of SimpleUniverse in fast3d.simple

      Methods in fast3d.simple that return SimpleUniverse 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      SimpleUniverse SimplePanel3d.getUni()
      equivalent to getUniverse() but returning the SimpleUniverse, because a SimplePanel3d in any case holds a SimpleUniverse

    • Uses of SimpleUniverse in fast3d.simple.fragment

      Methods in fast3d.simple.fragment that return SimpleUniverse 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      SimpleUniverse SimpleFragmentShader.getUniverse() 
      Constructors in fast3d.simple.fragment with parameters of type SimpleUniverse 
      Constructor and Description
      SimpleFragmentShader(SimpleUniverse uni, java.awt.image.BufferedImage img)
      calls super constructor
      SimpleFragmentShader(SimpleUniverse uni, java.awt.image.BufferedImage img, java.awt.Rectangle area)
      calls super constructor
      SimpleFragmentShader(SimpleUniverse uni, int imagewidth, int imageheight)
      calls super constructor with the a plain image in the specified size of type BufferedImage.TYPE_INT_RGB and the rectangle area being the entire image
